languages.text: "Священный металл, что преградил путь, ослаблен. Напои его благодатной энергией, воззвав к машинному духу одного из генераторов, что укрыт где-то в этом отсеке".

traits.locale_text: "Священный металл, что преградил путь, ослаблен. Напои его благодатной энергией, воззвав к машинному духу одного из генераторов, что укрыт где-то в этом отсеке".

languages.text: "The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."
languages.original_text: "Священный металл, что преградил путь, ослаблен. Напои его благодатной энергией, воззвав к машинному духу одного из генераторов, что укрыт где-то в этом отсеке".

traits.locale_text: "The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let it drink blessed energy by appealing to the machine spirit of one of the generators, which is hidden somewhere in this module."
"The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let it drink blessed energy by appealing to the machine spirit of one of the generators, which is hidden somewhere in this module."

"The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

"The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

"The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

"The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

languages.text: “阻挠我们前进的神圣金属已经被削弱了。我们可以向其中一台发电机的机魂发出呼吁，这样金属就可以被它受祝福的能量滋养。这个区域的某个地方应该藏着一台发电机。”
languages.original_text: "The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

traits.locale_text: “阻挠我们前进的神圣金属已经被削弱了。我们可以向其中一台发电机的机魂发出呼吁，这样金属就可以被它受祝福的能量滋养。这个区域的某个地方应该藏着一台发电机。”

languages.text: «El metal sagrado que nos impide el paso está debilitado. Apelemos al espíritu máquina de uno de los generadores para que el metal pueda beber de sus benditas energías. Debería haber uno oculto en este módulo».
languages.original_text: "The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

traits.locale_text: «El metal sagrado que nos impide el paso está debilitado. Apelemos al espíritu máquina de uno de los generadores para que el metal pueda beber de sus benditas energías. Debería haber uno oculto en este módulo».

languages.text: 「自分達の道を塞ぐ神聖なる金属が弱まっている。どれか発電機の機械精霊に呼びかけて、金属が祝福のエネルギーを飲み込めるようにしよう。このモジュールのどこかに一匹は隠れているはずだ」
languages.original_text: "The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

traits.locale_text: 「自分達の道を塞ぐ神聖なる金属が弱まっている。どれか発電機の機械精霊に呼びかけて、金属が祝福のエネルギーを飲み込めるようにしよう。このモジュールのどこかに一匹は隠れているはずだ」

languages.text: "Das heilige Metall, das unseren Weg versperrt, ist geschwächt. Lasst uns den Maschinengeist eines der Generatoren anrufen, damit das Metall von seinen gesegneten Energien trinke. Irgendwo in diesem Modul müsste sich einer verbergen."
languages.original_text: "The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

traits.locale_text: "Das heilige Metall, das unseren Weg versperrt, ist geschwächt. Lasst uns den Maschinengeist eines der Generatoren anrufen, damit das Metall von seinen gesegneten Energien trinke. Irgendwo in diesem Modul müsste sich einer verbergen."

languages.text: « Le métal sacré qui nous barre la route est affaibli. Faisons appel à l'esprit de la machine de l'un des générateurs pour qu'il se nourrisse de ses saintes énergies. Il devrait y en avoir un caché quelque part dans ce module. »
languages.original_text: "The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

traits.locale_text: « Le métal sacré qui nous barre la route est affaibli. Faisons appel à l'esprit de la machine de l'un des générateurs pour qu'il se nourrisse de ses saintes énergies. Il devrait y en avoir un caché quelque part dans ce module. »

languages.text: "Yolumuzu muhafaza eden kutsal metal zayıfladı. Jeneratörlerden birinin makine ruhundan kutsal enerji dilenelim ki metal, bu enerjiden nemalansın. Bu modülde bir tane saklı olmalı."
languages.original_text: "The sacred metal that bars our path is weakened. Let us appeal to the machine spirit of one of the generators so the metal may drink from its blessed energies. There should be one hidden somewhere in this module."

traits.locale_text: "Yolumuzu muhafaza eden kutsal metal zayıfladı. Jeneratörlerden birinin makine ruhundan kutsal enerji dilenelim ki metal, bu enerjiden nemalansın. Bu modülde bir tane saklı olmalı."
